mainText:
Sorry for my english. It's late here in Paris, France but I wanted to 
write just some words and say I'm sad to learn this loss. I'm just a 
french guy fascinated by so much creative man and I'm a real fan of his 
work. I'm writing this message from my MacBook, so aware of what Steve 
Jobs brought us all. Thank you mister.

Rest in peace.
author: Christophe
